snippet.title: Johnny Depp joked 'Amber Turd' was 'in the dumps' after he found a poo in bed
snippet.description: branded his ex-wife "Amber Turd" and joked she was "in the dumps" after he found a poo in his bed.    The Hollywood actor, 57, spend four days this week giving evidence at London's High Court as part of his libel case against News Group Newspapers.  Depp is suing NGN over a story published in The Sun in 201 which branded him a "wife beater" - a claim which he strenuously denies.   In his witness statement, Depp claimed he decided to end their marriage in 2016 when a poo was left in their marital bed, which he believes was left by Amber or one of her friends.   During his testimony yesterday, the court heard Depp had been sent a picture of the poo by his assistant and replied with a series of jokes - cing his wife "Amber Turd”' and adding "Amber’s in the dumps".   In one message, read out in court, Depp wrote: “It’s hilarious. Not sure I’ve laughed this hard for years. At least the photographs are good."  He later insisted the poo incident forced him to make "the difficult decision no ...
